```{r cars}
library(arules)
data(Groceries)

rules <- apriori(Groceries, parameter = list(support = 0.001, confidence = 0.5))

rules <- rules[!is.redundant(rules)]

pastryRules <- subset(rules, rhs %in% "pastry")

inspect(pastryRules)
```
